variables.name: A11Y_MODE_MEDIA_A11Y_VOLUME
variables.comment:
* Accessibility volume policy where the STREAM_MUSIC volume (i.e. media volume) affects
     * the STREAM_ACCESSIBILITY volume, and vice-versa.

variables.name: A11Y_MODE_INDEPENDENT_A11Y_VOLUME
variables.comment:
* Accessibility volume policy where the STREAM_ACCESSIBILITY volume is independent from
     * any other volume.

variables.name: volumeDownToEnterSilent
variables.comment: Allow volume adjustments lower from vibrate to enter ringer mode = silent

variables.name: volumeUpToExitSilent
variables.comment: Allow volume adjustments higher to exit ringer mode = silent

variables.name: doNotDisturbWhenSilent
variables.comment: Automatically enter do not disturb when ringer mode = silent

variables.name: vibrateToSilentDebounce
variables.comment:
Only allow volume adjustment from vibrate to silent after this
        number of milliseconds since an adjustment from normal to vibrate.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
